UI_restart_text: Hangar Painter: {reason}. Client restart required to accept changes.
UI_setting_colour_tooltip: This colour will be applied to all hangar texts. WARNING! Restart is required for this setting to be applied properly.
UI_setting_crewColour_tooltip:
Crew names and ranks in the sidebar will be coloured, but it glitches in tankmen replacement view.

You will need to select another vehicle for changes to take effect.
